QuestData.Title: Charming the Lifeless
QuestData.Description:
<You've seen a charm like this in Fallhaven being used to control a wicker construct.
If you can figure out how to use it, you may be able to take control of one of the coven's wicker constructs.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Test the Wicker Charm on Dormant Ravagers in Fletcher's Hollow until you successfully control one.
QuestData.RewardText:
You were able to control one of their creations?! That's amazing!
This could really turn the tide for us!
